author: adapdoaosdaoda
description: Weekly game information tracker for Where Winds Meet. Manages Trade Commission reset schedules and provides formatted updates.
end_user_data_statement: This cog does not store end user data. It only stores guild-level configuration for Trade Commission scheduling and game information.
install_msg: Thanks for installing TradeCommission! Use `[p]tcset` to configure weekly reset timing and game information.
name: TradeCommission
short: Weekly game info tracker for Where Winds Meet.
